amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Amtrak by $214 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offsets) for Amtrak by $214,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 266 - 158 (Roll no. 263).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. LaTourette.
